locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Lizee Walsh, a beautiful, young brilliant surf star from the gritty streets of Rockaway Beach, NY. Lizee is caught in a power struggle to save her blue collar beach town from greedy developers and politicians. A local surfer showers her with lavish gifts from drug deals. A Manhattan scion will do anything for her love. This is a rare story about the power of a young woman fighting tooth and nail for her own identity against brutal odds.
imdb.title: Surf City

A Manhattan scion will do anything for her love. This is a rare story about the power of a young woman fighting tooth and nail for her own identity against brutal odds.::kevin breslin
